summary: Tested mobile full-bleed layout (banner/media player edge-to-edge), desktop rounded corners, and search/filter functionality for both Admin Dashboard sidebar and Administration sub-panel sidebar. All features working correctly.
passed_tests: Mobile Full-Bleed (375x812): Banner carousel has 0px left/right gap - TRUE edge-to-edge
Mobile Full-Bleed (375x812): Banner carousel has border-radius: 0px (rounded-none working)
Mobile Full-Bleed (375x812): Media player has 0px left/right gap - TRUE edge-to-edge
Mobile Full-Bleed (375x812): Media player has border-radius: 0px (rounded-none working)
Mobile Full-Bleed (375x812): Header padding is 0px (px-0 applied correctly)
Mobile Full-Bleed (375x812): Media section padding is 0px (px-0 applied correctly)
Desktop (1920x800): Banner carousel has border-radius: 16px (sm:rounded-2xl working)
Desktop (1920x800): Media player has border-radius: 16px (sm:rounded-2xl working)
Desktop (1920x800): Header padding is 32px (sm:px-8 = 2rem working)
Desktop (1920x800): Media section padding is 32px (sm:px-8 working)
Admin Sidebar Search: data-testid='sidebar-search' input found
Admin Sidebar Search: Type 'wal' - only 'Billetera' shows under COMMERCE group
Admin Sidebar Search: Type 'pin' - only 'PinPanClub' shows under COMMUNITY group
Admin Sidebar Search: Type 'community' - shows entire Community group (PinPanClub, Comunidad, Tickets/Chat)
Admin Sidebar Search: Clear search - all groups reappear (OVERVIEW, COMMERCE, COMMUNITY, MANAGEMENT, SYSTEM)
Administration Sub-Panel: Click Administraci√≥n loads AdminModule with search input
Administration Sub-Panel Search: data-testid='admin-module-search' input found
Administration Sub-Panel Search: Type 'tele' - shows only 'Telegram' under COMMUNITY group
Administration Sub-Panel Search: Type 'banner' - shows 'Banners & Media' under CONTENT group
Administration Sub-Panel Search: Click filtered 'Banners & Media' - loads Banner Carousel admin correctly
critical_code_review_comments: MosaicCommunityLanding.jsx: px-0 sm:px-8 correctly applies 0 padding on mobile (<640px) and 32px on desktop
BannerCarousel.jsx: rounded-none sm:rounded-2xl correctly applies 0px border-radius on mobile and 16px on desktop
MediaPlayer.jsx: rounded-none sm:rounded-2xl correctly applies responsive rounded corners
AdminDashboard.jsx: sidebarSearch state + displayNavGroups useMemo correctly filters by id, label, and group name
AdminModule.jsx: search state + displaySections useMemo correctly filters by label, id, and group name
Note: Initial mobile measurements showed padding due to 700ms transition animation - after waiting for animation to complete, all values correct
context_for_next_testing_agent: Mobile full-bleed for banner carousel and media player verified working at 375px viewport - both go edge-to-edge with 0px border radius. Desktop view at 1920px shows 16px border radius and 32px padding. Admin sidebar search (data-testid='sidebar-search') filters by item id, translated label, AND group name. Administration sub-panel search (data-testid='admin-module-search') also filters by id, label, and group name. All search features working. Note that the page has 700ms transition animations that can affect measurements if checked too early.
